song.title: Runners
song.info:
My attempt to make a song for running. I started with the premise of something progressive, a mid-tempo beat and encouraging melody so you like to move yourself. Kind of experimental, and my first Atarisong since over a year.
maxYMiser for composing, renoise for mixing .
3rd place at Nectarine Scenecompos #31, "Runner Compo".
